00073 #include "ZNconfig.h"
00074 #include <cmath>
00075 #include "LinAlg/linalg.h"

00077 //===========================================================================
00158 void eigensymmJacobi
00159 (
00160         Array2D< double >& amatA,
00161         Array2D< double >& vmatA,
00162         Array  < double >& dvecA
00163 )
00164 {
00165         SIZE_CHECK( amatA.ndim( ) == 2 && amatA.dim( 0 ) == amatA.dim( 1 ) )
00166 
00167         const unsigned maxIterC = 50;
00168 
00169         vmatA.resize( amatA );
00170         dvecA.resize( amatA.dim( 0 ) );
00171 
00172         double **a = amatA.ptrArr( );
00173         double **v = vmatA.ptrArr( );
00174         double  *d = dvecA.elemvec( );
00175         unsigned n = dvecA.nelem( );
00176 
00177     unsigned j, iq, ip, i;
00178     double thresh, theta, tau, t, sm, s, h, g, c;
00179 
00180     Array< double > b( dvecA.nelem( ) );
00181     Array< double > z( dvecA.nelem( ) );
00182 
00183     for( ip = 0; ip < n; ip++ )
00184         {
00185                 for( iq = 0; iq < n; iq++ )
00186                 {
00187                         v [ip] [iq] = 0.0;
00188                 }
00189                 v [ip] [ip] = 1.0;
00190                 b( ip ) = d [ip] = a [ip] [ip];
00191                 z( ip ) = 0.0;
00192     }
00193 
00194     for( i = 1; i <= maxIterC; i++ )
00195         {
00196                 sm = 0.0;
00197 
00198                 for( ip = 0; ip < n - 1; ip++ )
00199                 {
00200                         for( iq = ip + 1; iq < n; iq++ )
00201                         {
00202                                 sm += fabs( a [ip] [iq] );
00203                         }
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 if( sm == 0.0 )
00207                 {
00208                     eigensort( vmatA, dvecA );
00209 
00210                     return;
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 thresh = i < 4 ? 0.2 * sm / ( n * n ) : 0.0;
00214 
00215                 for( ip = 0; ip < n - 1; ip++ )
00216                 {
00217                         for( iq = ip + 1; iq < n; iq++ )
00218                         {
00219                                 g = 100.0 * fabs( a [ip] [iq] );
00220 
00221                                 if( i > 4 && fabs( d [ip] ) + g == fabs( d [ip] )
00222                             && fabs( d [iq] ) + g == fabs( d [iq] ) )
00223                                 {
00224                                         a [ip] [iq] = 0.0;
00225                                 }
00226                                 else if( fabs( a [ip] [iq] ) > thresh )
00227                                 {
00228                                         h = d [iq] - d [ip];
00229 
00230                                         if( fabs( h ) + g == fabs( h ) )
00231                                         {
00232                                                 t = ( a [ip] [iq] ) / h;
00233                                         }
00234                                         else
00235                                         {
00236                                                 theta = 0.5 * h / ( a [ip] [iq] );
00237                                                 t = 1.0 / ( fabs( theta ) + sqrt( 1. + theta * theta ) );
00238                                                 if (theta < 0.0 )
00239                                                 {
00240                                                         t = -t;
00241                                                 }
00242                                         }
00243 
00244                                         c   = 1.0 / sqrt( 1 + t * t );
00245                                         s   = t * c;
00246                                         tau = s / (1.0 + c );
00247                                         h   = t * a [ip] [iq];
00248                                         z( ip ) -= h;
00249                                         z( iq ) += h;
00250                                         d [ip] -= h;
00251                                         d [iq] += h;
00252                                         a [ip] [iq] = 0.0;
00253 
00254                                         for( j = 0; j < ip; j++ )
00255                                         {
00256                                                 g = a [j] [ip];
00257                         h = a [j] [iq];
00258                         a [j] [ip] = g - s * (h + g * tau);
00259                         a [j] [iq] = h + s * (g - h * tau);
00260 
00261                                         }
00262                                         for( j = ip + 1; j < iq; j++ )
00263                                         {
00264                                                 g = a [ip] [j];
00265                         h = a [j] [iq];
00266                         a [ip] [j] = g - s * (h + g * tau);
00267                         a [j] [iq] = h + s * (g - h * tau);
00268                                         }
00269                                         for( j = iq + 1; j < n; j++ )
00270                                         {
00271                                                 g = a [ip] [j];
00272                         h = a [iq] [j];
00273                         a [ip] [j] = g - s * (h + g * tau);
00274                         a [iq] [j] = h + s * (g - h * tau);
00275                                         }
00276                                         for( j = 0; j < n; j++ )
00277                                         {
00278                                                 g = v [j] [ip];
00279                         h = v [j] [iq];
00280                         v [j] [ip] = g - s * (h + g * tau);
00281                         v [j] [iq] = h + s * (g - h * tau);
00282                                         }
00283                                 }
00284                         }
00285                 }
00286 
00287                 for( ip = 0; ip < n; ip++ )
00288                 {
00289                         b( ip ) += z( ip );
00290                         d [ip]  = b( ip );
00291                         z( ip )  = 0.0;
00292                 }
00293     }
00294 
00295     throw 1;
00296 }
